export const getFullYear = () => new Date().getFullYear();
export const getFooterCopy = isIndex => isIndex ? "Holberton School" : "Holberton School main dashboard";

sourcesContent:
export const getFullYear = () => new Date().getFullYear();

export const getFooterCopy = (isIndex) => (isIndex ? "Holberton School" : "Holberton School main dashboard");
